thread.title: FlipHTML5 Added Drag and Drop Features to Its Online Brochure Maker
thread.title_full: FlipHTML5 Added Drag and Drop Features to Its Online Brochure Maker

author: prbuzz.com
title: FlipHTML5 Added Drag and Drop Features to Its Online Brochure Maker
text:
FlipHTML5 has released their latest version of free online brochure making software with impressive and innovative features that offers more options to the brochure makers. This fifth version of FlipHTML5 with drag and drop feature gives the brochure makers a rich custom and user friendly experience to organize and create brochures of their own choices.
“Adding an interesting and easier feature, I feel proud to announce the drag-and-drop interface in an online brochure maker, which will allow the users to design the layout of videos, shapes, images and text in a convenient way.” Winston Zhang, CEO
Drag and drop interface of FlipHTML5 is an interactive and an easy way to create a beautiful brochure for any product and helps the users to work in an effective and an efficient manner. Drag and drop features gives the options to the users to drag the file or resize the image to a size that fits the slot in the brochure.
Making the brochure impressive was never an easy task but with drag and drop feature of FlipHTML5 the life of the designers will become convenient and they will be able to produce impressive brochure designs with less pain and less time.
FlipHTML5 is a software license that provides pre-designed templates for the brochure and the users can chose those templates to create an interactive brochure for them. So, if one is looking for an innovative online brochure maker, he/she has reached at a right place. Go to the FlipHTML5 website today and create one’s own brochure for free.
Designing a beautiful brochure is just a click away. Visit http://fliphtml5.com for further information about the product.
